name: Board Meeting
text:
You may flip to alter-ego form. Choose:
Exhaust Pepper Potts → remove Board Meeting from the game.
Discard 1 [[tech]] upgrade you control. If no upgrade was discarded this way, this card gains surge. Discard this obligation.

name: Helicopter Crash
text: A news helicopter has crashed in a heavily populated area and civilians are in danger! Evacuate them before the chopper explodes and any more lives are lost. [acceleration][crisis]

name: Burning Building
text: Forced Response: After the villain phase begins, deal 1 indirect damage to each player. Hero Action: Exhaust your hero and spend a [physical] resource → discard Burning Building. [crisis]

name: Wounded Civilians
text: Uses (1[per_hero] civilian counters). Interrupt: When a player would heal damage from a character, remove 1 civilian counter from here instead. [acceleration][acceleration]

name: Catastrophic Collision
text: Peril. When Revealed: Choose one: • Deal 2[per_hero] indirect damage to the players. This damage gains piercing. • Deal each player 1 facedown encounter card. • Each player discards the highest-cost card from their hand.

name: Innocent Bystander
text: Attach to your identity. You get -1 hand size. Hero Action: Exhaust your hero → discard this card and remove 1 threat from a scheme. [star] Boost: Place 2 threat on the main scheme.
